name: Blob Revenge
description:
Two scientists were commissioned by the company's president to create an artificial lifeform that produces Gello for the populace infinitely. However; the experiment went wrong despite its success. Greeny, blob created from Gello and garbage, began to show attitude problem towards humans. Greeny decided to get revenge by consuming the entire population of humans. Thus, the conquest of replacing the human population with blobs begin. Will he succeed or get eaten?

The paid version of Blob Revenge includes:

Two additional maps to explore
Three new blob characters to join the party
Powerful items to enhance gameplay
Powerful Optional boss to take on
